description:
Own the complete Need for Speed™ Rivals package, including the full game plus all six previously released downloadable content packs.

Welcome to Redview County, play as either cops or racer with unique gameplay for each side. Compete in an all-out war featuring the fastest cars, mods and technology in a gritty open road environment.

Additional Packs included:
Simply Jaguar Complete Pack
Ferrari Edizioni Speciali Complete Pack
Concept Lamborghini Complete Pack
The Koenigsegg Agera One
Complete Movie Pack
Loaded Garage Pack

The downloadable version of this game supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Japanese.

title: Need for Speed™ Rivals: Complete Edition
